text: 🚨 Women's Health 2.0: The AI Era 🚨👩‍⚕️ historic announcement by @FirstLadyJillBiden: $100 mil federal funding for women's health research! 💰💻🔍 broadening the definition of women's health beyond reproduction 💪👀 addressing overlooked & underserved health issues 🤝💬 join the conversation, what are your thoughts on Women's Health 2.0? 💬
